title: ISic001873. Funerary inscription for Kopria
body:
1Κοπρία
2χρηστὰ ❦ καὶ
3ἄμεμπτε
4χαῖρε ❦ ἔζη-
5σεν ἔτη λ´

1ΚΟΠΡΙΑ
2ΧΡΗΣΤΑ❦ΚΑΙ
3ΑΜΕΜΠΤΕ
4ΧΑΙΡΕ❦ΕΖΗ
5ΣΕΝΕΤΗΛ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text from autopsy;
  • 1: Orsi: ΚΟΠΡΙΑ(Ι)
  • 5: Orsi: ΕΤΗΑ.

English translation

Jonathan Prag

Kopria, worthy and blameless, farewell. She lived 30 years.

commentary

The name Kopria is rare, with only a single Sicilian attestation, from Catania. There is no clear basis for determining the potential relationship between Kopria, Mousa and Gamike, except that it seems likely that Mousa was the child of one of the other two. See also ISic001872 and ISic001871.

bibliography

    Orsi 1896 400 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001709
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
